pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wavelet Based Tools for Feature-Wise Analysis and Quantification of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) Spectra // Tools for feature based analysis of Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (NMR) spectra. Wavelets are used to quantify the peaks which are grouped into features with hierarchical clustering. The results can easily be incorporated in large-scale studies that include LC-MS analysis (as this is also peak/feature based).
